pr_title: check traffic during rerouteV2 in multiTable mode

timeline.bodyText: I think i't better to use switchHelper.updateSwitchProperties() here and in line 503 because switchHelper waits for rules installation
timeline.author: niksv
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -585,14 +611,12 @@ mode with existing flows and hold flows of different table-mode types"() {
                 changeSwitchPropsMultiTableValue(initSwProps[involvedSwitches[2].dpId], false))

replies.bodyText:
We can't use mentioned helper method everywhere.
Now and then default rules are not reinstalled according to switchProps. It depends on flow which are on a switch.
So it leaves me no choice but to do it on my own. I created separate method for updating swProps(changeSwitchPropsMultiTableValue) and checking default rules(checkDefaultRulesOnSwitches).
The  checkDefaultRulesOnSwitches  method waits for rules installation (L1307)
replies.author: andriidovhan
